patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Neurofibromatosis Type 1 (NF1)
2. McCune-Albright Syndrome
3. Osteogenesis Imperfecta
4. Paget's Disease of Bone
5. fibrous dysplasia of bone (McCune-Albright Syndrome)
6. Adrenal Hyperplasia due to Mutation in the StAR Gene (Simmonds Syndrome)
7. Gorlin Syndrome (Nevoid Basal Cell Carcinoma Syndrome)
8. Cherubism (Cherubism, Fibro-osseous Lesions)
9. Fibrodysplasia Ossificans Progressiva (FOP)
10. Osteopetrosis

Please note that these top 10 diagnoses are based on the patient's reported phenotype and may not be exhaustive. It is essential to consider other factors such as age, genetic background, and family history when arriving at a definitive diagnosis. Additionally, the presence of multiple rare diseases in the same patient is not uncommon, and further evaluation might be necessary to identify all underlying conditions.
